Author: lauryleah
Text: it's okay. don't blame yourself. sleeping more always helps me with my water retention also drink a lot! i know it's scary but drinking a lot of water actually helps with bloating x

Author: aggressivehealth9
Text: this is going to sound counter-intuitive, but drink plenty of water. also. cucumbers, watermelons, and cranberries can act as a diuretic and help with water retention.
